name: Patricia Healy
summary: Experienced Sous Chef with progression from commis to Sous Chef at Hilton Barbados. Skilled in menu writing and costing, staff training, cost control, and high-volume banquet operations. Proven leadership of teams up to 65 staff, and strong emphasis on quality, hygiene, and guest satisfaction.

experience.title: Sous Chef
experience.description: Opening and closing chef for a 350-room hotel with 3 restaurants. Managed breakfast (up to 511 covers across two locations), lunch (up to 113 à la carte and 250 with special buffets), beach bar (up to 385 covers), and dinner buffets. Expediting, training, menu writing and costings, overseeing rosters for ~65 chefs and casual staff, and maintaining payroll budgets. Led large banquets up to 1800 guests and conducted quality assurance audits.

experience.title: General Cook
experience.description: Responsible for breakfast, lunch, dinner a la carte service; interacted with guests at action stations; nominated Employee of the Month in 2003-2005.

experience.title: General Cook
experience.description: General cook – breakfast, lunch, dinner and room service à la carte; assisted with buffets; noted for perfect attendance.

education.degree: Certificate: Management Techniques for Senior Chefs
education.school: University of Birmingham / Barbados Hospitality Institute
Enlightening Achievement / Barbados CEO Patricia Healy

education.degree: Certificate: Small Dishes, Big Flavors from the Gardemanger
